product_name: Freestyle Shark Classic Candy Watch - Women's
long_description: Wrapped in a translucent, colorful case and band, the women's Freestyle Shark Classic Candy watch keeps accurate, three-hand time to keep your on-land or in-the-water adventures on schedule. Luminous hands; polycarbonate band. The Freestyle Shark Classic Candy watch resists water down to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: Wrapped in a translucent, colorful case and band, the women's Freestyle Shark Classic Candy watch keeps accurate, three-hand time to keep your on-land or in-the-water adventures on schedule.
